title: Recommender System using Language Models and Geolocation
description: Bachelor’s Thesis — Recommender System using Language Models and Geolocation: Developed a tourism-focused recommendation engine powered by AI and workflow orchestration. Integrated LLMs, external APIs, and user data to deliver high-precision, personalized travel suggestions.

title: mini-link! - URL Shortener App
description: Built a full-stack URL shortener connecting React (frontend), Express.js (backend), and TursoDB/SQLite (database), styled with TailwindCSS. Deployed on Vercel as a first hands-on experience deploying apps to an external hosting platform.
